description: An engineering graduate from IMT Atlantique with experience in IT projects and startup environments.
about_text_1: I'm a recent engineering graduate from IMT Atlantique with a passion for technology and problem-solving.
about_text_2: I completed a 3-year apprenticeship at Wavestone working on major IT projects including HR ERP, IAM, and data migration, with an exciting mission in New York.
about_text_3: I then joined a startup in Bangkok, where I contributed to the launch of a mobile product while helping structure the company's financial and technical foundations.
dream_frame_description: Generates a new background from a selfie using Stable Diffusion. Detects the person with YOLO and SAM to create a mask, then generates a new background image with a custom Stable Diffusion pipeline.
website_description: Created as a professional portfolio to showcase my work and skills. Deployed with Docker on AWS for reliability and scalability.
footer_description: Engineering graduate with passion for technology
